### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23474](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23474) (test: scripted-diff cleanups after generate* changes by MarcoFalk

Rebased 96c4cd092ed354858dfc457fafaec766b85c6e0d -> ff67a5d4c7a4899179f43fcfec4c61ef4bd7a1eb ([`pr/ipc-connect.2`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/ipc-connect.2) -> [`pr/ipc-connect.3`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/ipc-connect.3), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/ipc-connect.2-rebase..pr/ipc-connect.3)) on top of #10102 pr/ipc.118 fixing

Impressive change. Again!

Conceptual I'm not yet convinced.
My understanding is/was that `bitcoin-wallet` is an offline wallet exploring and manipulation tool without the requirement of a node or online connectivity.
Things that require a node, should IMO go into wallet RPC calls.
But my conceptual understanding might be old and rusty (happy to get convinced).
